title: Friedrich-Ebert-Stiftung
description: Friedrich-Ebert-Stiftung employs a vibrant palette dominated by warm and dynamic hues like 'ffcc00' (golden yellow) and 'd70000' (red) combined with deep tones like '8d0449' (burgundy) and '005597' (navy blue). These colors reflect both dynamism and tradition, symbolizing the foundation's commitment to social democracy. The color scheme is derived from their publicly accessible brand library, a source dedicated to maintaining consistent brand elements.
